plot: A group of people happen to meet at the same location for different purposes and realize a killer's on the loose and they have to get away from him.
title: The Happy Hike
plot_es: A group of people happen to meet at the same location for different purposes and realize a killer's on the loose and they have to get away from him.
plot_en: A group of people happen to meet at the same location for different purposes and realize a killer's on the loose and they have to get away from him.
